title: Has a solar eclipse started or ended a war or revolt? - Quora

response.answer_text: That would be a realistic scenario in antiquity. I don’t know of any but only a few causes of the end of a war are known. The Persians & Chinese knew of solar eclipses & could probably predict them. But the rest of the world, they were magic & might have ended a conflict or two.
Legend has it that on May 28th in the year 585 BCE, there was a battle between the Lydians and the Medes where fighting stopped when the eclipse happened, forcing at least a temporary truce.
